npid:1.name: Bob Sagget
npid:1.description: Shaggy old man, with an air of magic about him. Long gray beard, blue eyes and standing at a confident 3 feet and 4 inches!
npid:1.ac: 14 :: 10+3(DEX)+0(No armor, +4 if Mage Armor Cast)+1(dodge)+(4 more dodge if on an attack of opportunity due to movement)
npid:1.attacks: No physical attacks, prioritizes escaping via magic.
npid:1.skills: Acrobatics :: 5 ranks, Spellcraft :: 5 ranks, Knowledge(Arcana) :: 5 ranks
npid:1.gear: Just a few wands and a staff of the magus
npid:1.positive: They love magic, money and intelligence.
npid:1.negative: They hate persuasion attempts, losing money and anyone that disperages magic!
npid:1.goal: Bob Sagget has no goals in life, he just carries on.
npid:1.traits: Courteous, Ambitious, Flirty, Emotional and Loyal

npid:2.name: Billy Bob
npid:2.description: 7ft behemoth of muscle, he will likely punch you in the face... Avoid him.
npid:2.attacks: Perfers to use his large sized greatsword on anything that annoys him.
npid:2.positive: They love being the strongest around
npid:2.negative: They hate persuasion attempts, losing money and anyone that is stronger than them!
npid:2.goal: Billy Bob will be the hugest!

npid:3.name: Willian Marquess
npid:3.description: A fancy human, with an epic mustache (handlebarred 2 feet from each side), standing tall at a 6ft 2 and sporting a dashing trench-coat with embroidery!
npid:3.skills: Acrobatics :: 3 ranks, Disable Device :: 3, Disguise :: 3, Knowledge(Dungeoneering) :: 3, Knowledge(Engineering) :: 3, Knowledge(Local) :: 3, Knowledge(Arcana) :: 3, Sleight of Hand :: 3, Stealth :: 3, Perception :: 3, Survival :: 3, Use Magic Device :: 3
npid:3.clothing: Fancy embroidered coat, pirate's blouse and boots.
npid:3.positive: Flirtatious behavior, money and outwitting others
npid:3.goal: Being the fanciest of men and the roguish of rogues
npid:3.language: Common, Elven, Gnomish, Draconic, Abyssal, Celestial

npid:4.name: Cucumber Bandersnatch
npid:4.description: A tall lanky man with curly black hair and a goatee that can only be described as handsome.
npid:4.attacks: Specializes as a combat healer, doesn't truly fight but instead supports allies
npid:4.feats: Combat Expertise, Extra Channel, Extra Channel, Extra Channel
npid:4.clothing: Cucumber Cumberband under a cleric's robes.
npid:4.gear: Two large shields, one for self protection another to place in front of friends
npid:4.positive: Helping others, unselfish behaviour and being diplomatic.
npid:4.negative: People that treat others like garbage, those that would wish harm upon others and greedy aristocrats.
npid:4.goal: To save as many as he can by harming as few as possible.

npid:5.name: Prantha Basi
npid:5.description: She's a short, bald human that is blind. Not much else is known about her.
npid:5.feats: Improved Unarmed Strike, Bleeding Strike, Dodge, Mobility
